snippet: As President Obama and his family prepared to depart for Selma, Ala., the Secret Service began examining a car parked near the presidential residence.
abstract: Secret Service puts White House under lockdown for just under two hours after bomb-sniffing dog alerts handlers to search car parked nearby.
lead_paragraph: As President Obama and his family prepared to depart for Selma, Ala., the Secret Service began examining a car parked near the presidential residence.

headline.main: Secret Service Briefly Locks Down White House After Bomb-Sniffing Dog’s Alert and Nearby Fire
headline.print_headline: Secret Service Briefly Locks Down White House After Bomb-Sniffing Dog’s Alert and Nearby Fire
